name: Izo
text: On Play Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including 'Whitebeard Pirates' other than [Izo] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. On Opponent's Attack You may trash this Character: Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand to the bottom of your deck.
